solution_line_template: Jamie needed {rungs_climbed_last_time}/{tree_height_last_time} = <<{rungs_climbed_last_time}/{tree_height_last_time}={rungs_per_foot}>>{rungs_per_foot} rungs per foot of the tree to save the first cat.
To climb a {current_tree_height}-foot tree, Jamie needs {current_tree_height}*{rungs_per_foot} = <<{current_tree_height}*{rungs_per_foot}={total_rungs_needed}>>{total_rungs_needed} rungs
